operators.name: All
operators.description: Determine whether all items emitted by an Observable meet some criteria

operators.name: Amb
operators.description: Given two or more source Observables, emit all of the items from only the first of these Observables to emit an item or notification

operators.name: Contains
operators.description: Determine whether an Observable emits a particular item or not

operators.name: DefaultIfEmpty
operators.description: Emit items from the source Observable, or a default item if the source Observable emits nothing

operators.name: SequenceEqual
operators.description: Determine whether two Observables emit the same sequence of items

operators.name: SkipUntil
operators.description: Discard items emitted by an Observable until a second Observable emits an item

operators.name: SkipWhile
operators.description: Discard items emitted by an Observable until a specified condition becomes false

operators.name: TakeUntil
operators.description: Discard any items emitted by an Observable after a second Observable emits an item or terminates

operators.name: TakeWhile
operators.description: Mirror items emitted by an Observable until a specified condition becomes false
